content.question: <math alttext="the integral from, 0 to 1, of, open parenthesis, x plus 2, close parenthesis, times, open parenthesis, 3 times x squared, plus 12 x, plus 1, close parenthesis raised to the one half power, d x, equals" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mo>∫</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msubsup><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>12</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math>

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
